Articles.Content: I feel like having more music would be fun in KSP. It would be interesting if the game had music that it played when you did something important, like land on a new planet, return to Kerbin successfully, or have a "catastrophic failure," (when it tells you in the mission log.)
Yes indeed, this really need to be implemented, it would give you a really good mood

better sound all around, not just music. i hate to say it but i mostly play with the sound off. i find the game's sound effects sparse and unappealing. you might argue that its more realistic this way, but you can be realistic and still have a diverse array of sound effects.

Edited January 6, 2014 by Nuke
Check out this guy's thoughts. He's got some really great ideas that you are looking for. Go Modders!

Though not strictly needed, I'd really appreciate the addition of new dynamic music into the game, following the basic idea that that guy from the video had. Entering the sphere of influence of another body, landing or getting into orbit... Just imagine if all those actions were accompanied by their own specific track =D

Check out this guy's thoughts. He's got some really great ideas that you are looking for. Go Modders!

I saw that video! That idea is great!
